flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: You will learn how-to build a flying quadcopter that is able to keep itself level in the air.

guide.summary: This project will walk you through building an autonomous quadcopter
guide.title: Scout - DIY Flying Robot
